ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: you will mount up stage by stage!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: That you will climb from stage to stage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: you shall proceed onwards from stage to stage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: that you will certainly pass through one stage after another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: You will surely go up level by level.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: You shall certainly travel from stage
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: That you shall most certainly enter one state after another.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: you shall surely ride stage after stage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: That ye shall journey on from plane to plane.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: you will progress from stage to stage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Surely ye shall ride layer upon layer.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: you will surely fare from stage to stage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Ye shall surely travel from stage to stage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: You shall certainly travel from stage to stage (in this life and in the Hereafter).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: that you shall surely ride from stage to stage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: You will mount stage by stage.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: [That] you will surely experience state after state.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [84:19] you will surely journey (tarkabunna is actually tarkabūnanna, but the nūn of the indicative has been omitted because of two identical letters following one another, and the wāw [is omitted] because of two unvocalised consonants coming together), from stage to stage, state after state, namely, death, then life, then what comes afterwards of the states at the Resurrection.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (That ye shall journey) the whole creation shall be transformed (on from plane to plane) from one state to another; from the time He created them until the time they die, and from the time they die until they enter either Paradise or hell: in all these times Allah transforms them from one state to another; it is also said that this means: you shall journey, Muhammad, from one heaven to another on the day of the ascent; and it is also said that this means: this denier will go from one state to another, from the time he dies until he enters the Fire.
